name: Polynomial 2 - Universe of the Music
description: Polynomial 2 is an amazing visual candy which tends to be a space shooter and a music visualizer. Immersive on screen, mind-blowing in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compliant (some DirectX 9.0c cards may work as well) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560, AMD Radeon R7 250X. For 4K displays and VR, NVidia GT 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space
